gobblin.runtime.api

Interface JobCatalogListenersContainer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JobCatalog, JobCatalogWithTemplates, MutableJobCatalog
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CachingJobCatalog, FSJobCatalog, ImmutableFSJobCatalog, InMemoryJobCatalog, JobCatalogBase, JobCatalogListenersList, MutableCachingJobCatalog, MutableJobCatalogBase, NonObservingFSJobCatalog, PackagedTemplatesJobCatalogDecorator, StaticJobCatalog

    public interface JobCatalogListenersContainer
    Manages a collection of JobCatalogListeners .

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(JobCatalogListener jobListener)
      Adds a JobCatalogListener that will be invoked upon updates on the JobCatalog.
      void registerWeakJobCatalogListener(JobCatalogListener jobListener)
      Like addListener(JobCatalogListener) but it will create a weak reference.
      void removeListener(JobCatalogListener jobListener)
      Removes the specified listener.

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        void addListener(JobCatalogListener jobListener)
        Adds a JobCatalogListener that will be invoked upon updates on the JobCatalog. Upon registration JobCatalogListener.onAddJob(JobSpec) will be invoked for all pre-existing jobs in the JobCatalog.

      • registerWeakJobCatalogListener

        void registerWeakJobCatalogListener(JobCatalogListener jobListener)
        Like addListener(JobCatalogListener) but it will create a weak reference. The implementation will automatically remove the listener registration once the listener object gets GCed.

        Note that weak listeners cannot be removed using removeListener(JobCatalogListener).

      • removeListener

        void removeListener(JobCatalogListener jobListener)
        Removes the specified listener. No-op if not registered.
